original_text: And David came to the two hundred men, which were so faint that they could not follow David, whom they had made also to abide at the brook Besor: and they went forth to meet David, and to meet the people that were with him: and when David came near to the people, he saluted them.
korean_text: 다윗이 전에 피곤하여 능히 자기를 따르지 못하므로 브솔 시내에 머물게 한 이백 명에게 오매 그들이 다윗과 그와 함께 한 백성을 영접하러 나오는지라 다윗이 그 백성에게 이르러 문안하매

sentences.original_text: And David came to the two hundred men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗은 이백 명의 남자에게로 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: that they could not follow David
whom they had made also to abide at the brook Besor
and they went forth to meet David
and to meet the people that were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 함께 있는 사람들을 만나러 나아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and when David came near to the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗이 사람들에게 가까이 왔을 때
